citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 a.m. on
05/19/2015.
Upon arrival at the facility I knocked on the door. I also called the contact number and made contact with the
licensee. He was unable to return at that time but did provide more optimal hours for inspection.
End of report.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 a.m. on
05/19/2015.
Upon arrival at the facility I knocked on the door.  I also called the contact number and made contact with the
licensee.  He was unable to return at that time but did provide more optimal hours for inspection.
End of report.
